summary.para: Specifies input stream arguments for an input stream passed to.

An array of structures containing the set of references for video processing. If the stereo format is , then two sets of input streams must be supplied. For all other stereo formats, the first set of reference must be supplied, and the second should be zero initialized.
A structure specifying the flip, rotation, scale and destination translation for the video input.
A value from the enumeration specifying the options for the input stream.
A structure specifying the framerate and input and output indices for framerate conversion and deinterlacing.
The level to apply for each enabled filter. The filter level is specified in the order that filters appear in the enumeration. Specify 0 if a filter is not enabled or the filter index is reserved.
A structure specifying the planar alpha for an input stream on the video processor.
